name: Reknum: The Awakening
overview:
A game in development programmed from scratch for the NES with a current NES engine that translates current information and assets into the programming language of the time before which will be released in physical format.

In Reknum we will control Princess Cheri who will have to advance through labyrinthine dungeons to accumulate talismans that will help to recover her memory and that of her kingdom in order to fight against the evil sorceress and restore peace.
